publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-904 Stewart Stevenson: Rock Challenge-That the Parliament notes the excellent work undertaken by the Be Your Best Foundation in organising the 2004 Rock Challenge for school students, allowing them to use and develop music, dance, drama and production skills with the aim of encouraging young people to maintain a healthy lifestyle by making a commitment not to take drugs and avoid drinking and smoking, and congratulates Peterhead Academy on winning the Scottish heat of the competition with their "Maid in Scotland" production. Supported by: Rosie Kane*

S2M-904 Stewart Stevenson: Rock Challenge-That the Parliament notes the excellent work undertaken by the Be Your Best Foundation in organising the 2004 Rock Challenge for school students, allowing them to use and develop music, dance, drama and production skills with the aim of encouraging young people to maintain a healthy lifestyle by making a commitment not to take drugs and avoid drinking and smoking, and congratulates Peterhead Academy on winning the Scottish heat of the competition with their "Maid in Scotland" production. Supported by: Rosie Kane
S2M-904 Rock Challenge (lodged on 11 February 2004) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-904 Rock Challenge (lodged on 11 February 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-904 Rock Challenge (lodged on 11 February 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S2M-904 Rock Challenge (lodged on 11 February 2004) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-904 Rock Challenge (lodged on 11 February 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-904 Rock Challenge (lodged on 11 February 2004) Elaine Smith*
